Package ws.agents

The Wumpus Server Agent Framework, some classes that implement the core communication with the wumpus server, leaving only the decision-making for the agent programmers.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Action An action, that can be executed by an agent in the wumpus world.
BasicAgent A framework for the development of agents for the wumpus server.
BasicExplorer A framework for the development of explorers for the wumpus server.
BasicWumpus A framework for the development of wumpuses for the wumpus server.
CrazyExplorer A simple agent for the wumpus world game.
Grab A grab action, that can be executed by an explorer in the wumpus world.
Leave A leave action, that can be executed by an agent in the wumpus world when it's in the entry point of the cave.
Nop A null action, that can be executed by an agent in the wumpus world.
RightExplorer A simple agent for the wumpus world game.
Shoot A shoot action, that can be executed by an explorer in the wumpus world.
ShootExplorer  
Speak A speak action, that can be executed by an agent in the wumpus world.
StillWumpus A simple agent for the wumpus world game.
Turn A turn action, that can be executed by an agent in the wumpus world.
TurnNotification Class that represents a turn notification from the wumpus server to an agent.
Walk A walk action, that can be executed by an agent in the wumpus world.
 

Exception Summary
AgentCreationException Exception thrown when there is an error while creating an agent that is trying to connect itself to the wumpus server.
 

Package ws.agents Description

The Wumpus Server Agent Framework, some classes that implement the core communication with the wumpus server, leaving only the decision-making for the agent programmers.
